title: Leather
description: Aging porn star Pierce Wilder would like nothing more than to leave adult film forever. He dreams of a simple domestic life, a wife, children, a dog and a white picket fence. He wants a normal 9 to 5 job. When he meets Detective Celeste Morales, it appears that his dreams might come true.But the industry isn’t so willing to let him go; neither are his fans. They love him far too much to let him walk away…But there’s someone out there who doesn’t love Pierce. In fact, they want him gone, forever.Rating: Carnal/Erotic.
author: Belinda McBride
